p: A total of 680 adult mosquitoes were captured by BG-traps, including 586 (86.18%) Ae. albopictus, 86 (12.65%) Ar. obturbans, and 8 (1.18%) Culex pipiens pallens. Of all the Ae. albopictus, 483 (82.42%) were females, and 103 (17.58%) were males. In Chongwen and Songyuan village, 438 and 242 adult mosquitoes were captured, accounting for 64.41% and 35.59%, respectively.
